# Welcome to AiChaos on GitHub

AiChaos is a GitHub organization that focuses on chatbot technology, most notably the [RiveScript](https://www.rivescript.com/) scripting language. This web page serves as a high-level tour of some of the notable open source repositories in the AiChaos organization.

# RiveScript

RiveScript is a simple plaintext scripting language for chatbots. In its simplest form, RiveScript code can look like this:

```
+ hello bot
- Hello, human!
```

The official RiveScript website is at <https://www.rivescript.com/>

## Specification

The RiveScript specification can be found at the [RiveScript Working Draft](https://github.com/aichaos/rivescript-wd) repository on GitHub, or at <https://www.rivescript.com/wd/RiveScript>.

## Implementations

The RiveScript scripting language has been officially implemented in five different programming languages:

* [Go](https://github.com/aichaos/rivescript-go)
* [Java](https://github.com/aichaos/rivescript-java)
* [JavaScript](https://github.com/aichaos/rivescript-js)
* [Perl](https://github.com/aichaos/rivescript-perl)
* [Python](https://github.com/aichaos/rivescript-python)

## Personalities

* [Aiden](https://github.com/aichaos/aiden) is a RiveScript chatbot personality.

# Chatbot Applications

The AiChaos organization also hosts the development of complete chatbot applications, which chat with users on various interfaces and are powered by RiveScript or other chatbot technology.

* [Scarecrow](https://github.com/aichaos/scarecrow) is a Slack and XMPP chatbot written in Go.
* [Admiral](https://github.com/aichaos/admiral) is a Slack bot written in Python.
* [Aires](https://github.com/aichaos/aires) is an XMPP and AOL Instant Messenger bot written in Python.

# Tools and Scripts

## Syntax Highlighters

* [Atom-RiveScript](https://github.com/aichaos/atom-rivescript) adds RiveScript language support to the Atom text editor.
* [RiveScript-SublimeText](https://github.com/thebakeryio/rivescript-sublimetext) adds RiveScript syntax highlighting for SublimeText.
* [vim-rivescript](https://static.rivescript.com/files/etc/vim-rivescript-0.01.tar.gz) adds RiveScript syntax highlighting for Vim.

## RiveScript Tools

* [aiml2rs](https://github.com/aichaos/aiml2rs) is a script to convert Alice AIML code into RiveScript code, and back again.
